CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "Convex Hull" command in Edit > Selection menu, that replace the current ROI by its convex hull.
# Get convex hull of the ROI # Get current ImagePlus image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Get current ROI roi = image.getRoi() if roi is not None: # Get hull as polygon polygon = roi.getConvexHull() # Create new ROI from polygon image.setRoi(PolygonRoi(polygon.xpoints, polygon.ypoints, polygon.npoints, Roi.POLYGON));
